forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain between 3am and 4am, then a chance of rain showers between 4am and 5am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. West wind around 12 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 10am. Mostly cloudy. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 53 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 10 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As the clock approaches the early hours in Downtown San Francisco, a humid chill hangs in the air, whispering promises of rain that may arrive while many are still cocooned in their beds. The night conceals a blend of cloud and an understated charm, with temperatures languishing around a cool fifty degrees. A gusty west wind stirs the city, rustling through the streets and reinforcing that signature chill. The likelihood of rain, albeit modest, could touch the city just after dawn, bringing a gentle patter that might awaken the weary.

Tomorrow’s dawn brings a farewell to the night’s whispers, with clouds lingering overhead, softening the morning light. The staccato of rain showers may appear in the hours before 10 a.m., offering a fleeting sense of freshness that this city knows so well. As temperatures stagnate in the mid-fifties, one might consider layering—donning a light jacket or sweater along with a weather-resistant outer layer to fend off the dampness, while sturdy boots will lend practicality to the day’s endeavors. The brisk conditions and the gray sky invite introspective walks through the fog-enveloped streets or a cozy afternoon spent in a beloved café, perhaps with a steaming cup of coffee or tea. With the shifting light and the soft sounds of drizzling rain, it promises to be a day where one can find comfort in simplicity and refuge in the charm of urban life.
